content: half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 chain 7 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 twice slip_stitch into original chain single_crochet in next 12 chains single_crochet 9 on body 16 single_crochet around working around legs 18 17 single_crochet 1 inv decrease around 12 stuff body 18 inv decrease around 6 tie off leaving a long tail using yarn needle thread through the back loop only of each st around and pull to cinch shut weave in the end now you have a frog pattern ©2020 monica s menagerie do not sell this pattern as your own or redistribute it frog with safety eyes and eyelids frog with embroidered eyes french knots pattern ©2020 monica s menagerie do not sell this pattern as your own or redistribute it
